visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type: line, Chart title: Monthly Sales Data, Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333; Y-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333; Data series: Series 1 should have the name '2022 Sales' and data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4]; Custom colors: Use #0073e6 for the line color; Additional configurations: Set the chart background to #f9f9f9, add a legend with the title 'Sales Data', and set the chart margins to 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, and 100px left.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'line', and the background color is set to a light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins to provide more space around the chart area. The X-axis and Y-axis labels are styled with Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. The data series includes one series named '2022 Sales' with the specified data points, and the line color is set to a custom blue (#0073e6). Additionally, a legend is included with the title 'Sales Data' to help identify the series on the chart.
